title: Large-Scale Commodity Knowledge Organization and Intelligent Query Optimization
abstract: The Internet is facing the era of knowledge interconnection Web3.0, and its goal is to realize a more intelligent network that can be understood by both humans and machines. In this environment, various types of knowledge graphs have emerged. Because of the heterogeneity of knowledge, commodity knowledge makes its management more challenging. A large-scale product knowledge organization framework is designed, objective product classification knowledge is combined with subjective user perspectives in the framework, a neural network-based learning index technology is proposed to improve query efficiency. According to the properties of the knowledge structure and the characteristics of query requirements, a connection strategy is realized based on sub-variable combination.The experimental results show that, compared with the existing knowledge management system, the proposed method has a significant improvement in the retrieval efficiency of large-scale commodity knowledge.
tldr_ja: 本論文では、Web3.0時代における大規模商品知識の管理フレームワークを提案し、客観的な商品分類知識と主観的なユーザー視点を統合しています。ニューラルネットワークを用いた学習インデックス技術により、クエリ効率を向上させる接続戦略を実現。実験結果は、提案手法が既存の知識管理システムに比べて大規模商品知識の検索効率を大幅に改善することを示しています。
